Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.GameLogic

Class AbsScoreBoard

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.GameLogic.AbsScoreBoard
Direct Known Subclasses:
J2DScoreBoard, SpriteScoreBoard
public abstract class AbsScoreBoard extends Object
An AbsScoreBoard is an abstract class that represents a scoreboard in the game.

It contains methods and fields related to managing and visualizing the scores of players.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    AbsScoreBoard(LinkedList<AbsPlayer> players)
    Constructs a new AbsScoreBoard object with the specified list of players.

      public abstract void visualize()
      Visualizes the score board. This method must be implemented by the subclasses.

    • createScoreBoard

      public abstract void createScoreBoard(int cellSize, int width)
      Creates a score board with the specified cell size and width.
      Parameters:
      cellSize - The size of each cell in the score board
      width - The width of the score board
